Title: The Best Way to Use Sheep
Description:
I'm not gonna send ye off without showin' ye how tae properly use this spell.

Ye wanna cast Polymorph if ye get yerself into a situation when two foes are fightin' ye at once. 

Cole and I will spar with ye a bit tae make sure ye know what tae do.
ObjectivesText: Practice using Polymorph against Meredy and Private Cole.

Objectives.Text: Practice Polymorph with Meredy or Cole
Speak with Meredy to being sparring
